## type [Config](https://github.com/gojek/courier-go/blob/main/consul/config.go#L13-L21)



```go
type Config struct {
    ConsulAddress    string
    HealthyOnly      bool
    KVKey            string
    WaitTime         time.Duration
    Logger           *log.Logger
    OTel             *otelcourier.OTel
    DebounceDuration time.Duration
}
```
